android.car.app

类 RemoteCarTaskView

  • java.lang.Object
    • SurfaceView
      • android.car.app.RemoteCarTaskView
  • 直接已知子类:
    ControlledRemoteCarTaskView, RemoteCarDefaultRootTaskView, RemoteCarRootTaskView

    public abstract class RemoteCarTaskView
extends SurfaceView
    A SurfaceView that can embed a Task inside of it. The task management is done remotely in a process that has registered a TaskOrganizer with the system server. Usually this process is the Car System UI.

    • 方法详细资料

      • showEmbeddedTask

        public void showEmbeddedTask()
        Brings the embedded task to the front. Does nothing if there is no task.

      • updateWindowBounds

        public void updateWindowBounds()
        Updates the WM bounds for the underlying task as per the current view bounds. Does nothing if there is no task.

      • setObscuredTouchRect

        public void setObscuredTouchRect(Rect obscuredRect)
        Indicates a region of the view that is not touchable.
        参数:
        obscuredRect - the obscured region of the view.

      • setObscuredTouchRegion

        public void setObscuredTouchRegion(Region obscuredRegion)
        Indicates a region of the view that is not touchable.
        参数:
        obscuredRegion - the obscured region of the view.

      • getTaskInfo

        public abstract ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo getTaskInfo()
        返回:
        the android.app.ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo of the task currently running in the TaskView.

      • isInitialized

        public boolean isInitialized()
        返回:
        true, if the task view is initialized.

      • addInsets

        public void addInsets(int index,
                      int type,
                      Rect frame)
        Adds the given insets on the Task. The given frame for the insets type are applied to the underlying task right away. If a rectangle for an insets type was added previously, it will be replaced with the new value. If a rectangle for a insets type was already added, but is not specified currently in insets, it will remain applied to the task. Clients should explicitly call removeInsets(int, int) to remove the rectangle for that insets type from the underlying task.
        参数:
        index - An owner might add multiple insets sources with the same type. This identifies them.
        type - The insets type of the insets source.
        frame - The rectangle area of the insets source.

      • removeInsets

        public void removeInsets(int index,
                         int type)
        Removes the given insets from the Task. Note: This will only remove the insets that were added using addInsets(int, int, Rect)
        参数:
        index - An owner might add multiple insets sources with the same type. This identifies them.
        type - The insets type of the insets source. This doesn't accept the composite types.

      • release

        public void release()
        Release the resources associated with this task view.

      • onAttachedToWindow

        public void onAttachedToWindow()

      • onDetachedFromWindow

        public void onDetachedFromWindow()
